channel.title: [PI] Drops
channel.description:
[code]4151:1[code]
the one, whats it stand for?
The frequency of the drop?[/code]

item.title: [PI] Drops
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Give me an NPC from your Drops file and I will explain it like that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drops
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:373505”]You must remember that people can not control the items that drop first or that drop last.

As for changing the drop rate. This number should be beside the NPC’S Id.

Example: 1(Man Id): 100 (Rarity Drop)

The 100 is the rarity for that particular NPC. You can change it with great amount of numbers, and the higher the number. The harder the item is to obtain.

You must also remember; in order for the item to become a rare item. You must create another line.[/quote]

Another line?
Please explain

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Drops
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You must remember that people can not control the items that drop first or that drop last.

As for changing the drop rate. This number should be beside the NPC’S Id.

Example: 1(Man Id): 100 (Rarity Drop)

The 100 is the rarity for that particular NPC. You can change it with great amount of numbers, and the higher the number. The harder the item is to obtain.

You must also remember; in order for the item to become a rare item. You must create another line.

Read full topic

oh, right.

How would i change the drop ratE?
